channel.title: Germany on Harsh's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Germany on Harsh's Blog

item.title: German Inefficiencies
item.description: Germany has an age-old stereotype of being an efficient country. German Efficiency is a myth that has stood the test of time for centuries. The reality is quite the opposite if one looks at typical bureaucracy that runs in German society. I have been living in Germany for close 1.5 years and I have visited Germany 3-4 years ago a couple of times for more than 3 months and I have found that Germany is anything but efficient.
